text:
just a small typo: The server.xml delivered with 4.1.17 comes with a typo in a
commented Engine tag, where it says jmvRoute instead of jvmRoute.
As the tag is commented, the typo has no effect, unless you remove the comment
and don't check the already written values.
creator: jakarta-bug-handler@abstrakt.de
tomcat@ronans.us
text:
This typo is still in the Tomcat 5.0.2 alpha releases.  I know it seems trivial, 
but my system administrators did a cut-and-paste and we wasted days trying to 
get load balancing to work.
*** Bug 21999 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: yannc76@yahoo.de
